solution_line_template: Today Aunt May's cows gave her {morning_milk} gallons + {evening_milk} = <<{morning_milk}+{evening_milk}={total_milk_today}>>{total_milk_today} gallons of milk.
She had {total_milk_today} gallons - {sold_to_factory} gallons sold to the ice cream factory = <<{total_milk_today}-{sold_to_factory}={milk_after_sale}>>{milk_after_sale} gallons of milk left.

Combined with the leftover from yesterday, Aunt May has {milk_after_sale} gallons + {leftover_yesterday} gallons = <<{milk_after_sale}+{leftover_yesterday}={final_milk_left}>>{final_milk_left} gallons of milk.
